snippet: The tech giant will offer online tutorials, visual simulations and a gamelike system that will parcel out access to a modest quantum computer.
abstract: Bits blog; IBM is making available simple online tutorial called Quantum Experience that will allow users to experiment with algorithms on research-oriented quantum computer.
lead_paragraph: The tech giant will offer online tutorials, visual simulations and a gamelike system that will parcel out access to a modest quantum computer.

headline.main: IBM Wants Everyone to Try a Quantum Computer
